action_items: {"instruction": "Take the provided HTML for the 'Enhanced Value Manager - Complete User Guide' and use its principles to create a new, self-contained HTML application called 'AEON Hub'
This new application should have a window-centric UI where a main 'Consciousness Interface' is the central focus
The other functions (Replication, Orchestrator, USF, Status, Bundle) should be interactive, satellite nodes visually connected to the central window

Also, add keyboard shortcuts for each node (O, R, U, S, B), animate the connecting edges when a node is active, and implement a radial grid system with presets (Classic, Compact, Wide) that the nodes can snap to
